title: MISS 1350 rp without buying
body: i miss all my rp without using it... plss help me

replies.body: I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary here, but you can check your purchase history via the store to review your recent transactions.  If something feel off, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team will be happy to give context or review any concerns you have.  Hope that helps!
